1. Build a Strong Niche Presence

Brands seek niche expertise.

  • Focus: Specialize in beauty, fitness, or food.
  • Engage: Aim for 5%+ engagement via comments and Stories.

Polished content attracts brands.

  • Post Consistently: 3–5 posts weekly.
  • Maintain Style: Use cohesive filters or colors.

4. Craft a Winning Pitch

Stand out with your pitch.

  • Personalize: Reference the brand’s values.
  • Highlight Metrics: Share engagement and demographics.
  • Propose Ideas: Suggest a campaign concept.

5. Track Campaign Performance

Prove your value.

  • Monitor Metrics: Track views, likes, or sales.
  • Share Reports: Provide analytics screenshots.

6. Build Long-Term Relationships
